net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Gets answers from the user asking what the effective skill level is, and for any modifiers -->
[H: Success = input("Skill | 10 | Skill Level", "Mods | 0 | Any modifiers to skill","Cap | 0 | Maximum skill cap (leave zero if not applicable)")]
<!-- aborts the macro if the user canceled (UNLIKE OPENRPG WHICH JUST KEEPS GOING AAAARG -->
[H: abort(Success)]
<!-- calls the GURPS dieroller to find out the results of the skill test -->
[R,IF(Cap==0),CODE:{
[R:skill(Skill,Mods)]
};{
[R:skill(Skill,Mods,Cap)]
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Skill Check
Pick skill

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h:Block1 = 0] [h:Block2 = 0] [h:Parry1 = 0] [h:Parry2 = 0] [h:Parry3 = 0] [h:Parry4 = 0] [h: setProperty("MyBlock1Index", " ")] [h: setProperty("MyBlock2Index", " ")] [h: setProperty("MyParry1Index", " ")] [h: setProperty("MyParry2Index", " ")] [h: setProperty("MyParry3Index", " ")] [h: setProperty("MyParry4Index", " ")] [h,foreach(macro,getMacros()), code: { [h,foreach(index, getMacroIndexes(macro)), code: { [h: props = getMacroProps(index)] [sortLabel = getStrProp(props, "sortBy")] [r: "Sort on "+sortLabel] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense1.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyBlock1Name")+" ("+Block1+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense2.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyBlock2Name")+" ("+Block2+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense3.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyParry1Name")+" ("+Parry1+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense4.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyParry2Name")+" ("+Parry2+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense5.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyParry3Name")+" ("+Parry3+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense6.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyParry4Name")+" ("+Parry4+")")] }] }] [h: setMacroProps(getMacroButtonIndex(), "label=Start turn;color=white;fontColor=black")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Start turn
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Reset Block and Parry counters. Roll to stay conscious if at or below 0 HP.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Pick Stat

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H:AccBase=4] [H:SkillBase=19] [h:status = input( "FastDrawMods|0|Fast Draw Modifiers?", "FastReadyMods|0|Fast Ready Modifiers (beyond -3)", "junk|   | Actual Shooting |LABEL | TEXT=FALSE ", "AccApply|1|Does ACC apply?|CHECK", "DistancePenalty|2 yd,3 yd,5 yd,7 yd,10 yd,15 yd,20 yd,30 yd,50 yd,70 yd,100 yd|Distance Penalty|RADIO", "MiscMods|0|Miscelaneous shooting modifiers", "damType|imp,(2) pi,cut|Damage Type|RADIO|VALUE=STRING" )] [h:abort(status)] [h:Acc = if(AccApply == 1, if(damType == "cut",AccBase-1,AccBase), 0)] Fast Draw: Bow ({SkillBase-2}) [sk(SkillBase-2,FastDrawMods)]
Fast Ready Bow ({SkillBase-3}) [sk(SkillBase,-3+FastReadyMods)]
Fast Shoot Bow ({SkillBase}) @ range penalty -{DistancePenalty} [t:attk(SkillBase,-3+Acc-DistancePenalty+MiscMods)]
Damage is [t:1d6+4] {damType} if successful.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Bow Rapid Strike
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Fast Draw Rapid Load Rapid Fire in a nice bundle with range penalties.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: <!-- Attack with the base skill from the pick list and any specified mods and cap --!> <!-- You can replace the full skill list with a shorter one by changing both the SkillList and SkillLevels below --!> <!-- They must be comma delimited lists of skill names and skill levels. --!> [h:AttackSkillList = "Bow (18),Brawling (14),Broadsword (13),Horse Archery (Bow) (18),Knife (13),Shield (14),Shortsword (15),Throwing (10),Thrown Weapon (Knife) (9)"] [h:AttackSkillLevels = "18,14,13,18,13,14,15,10,9"] [h:RangeListYards = "2,3,5,7,10,15,20,30,50"] [h:RangeListPenalties = "0,-1,-2,-3,-4,-5,-6,-7,-8"] [h: Success=input("curSkill|"+AttackSkillList+"|Skill:|LIST","Mods | 0 | Modifiers to skill","Range | 0 | Range (0 for not applicable)", "Cap | 0 | Skill cap (0 for none)")] [h: abort(Success)] [h: curLevel=listGet(AttackSkillLevels,curSkill)] [r: "Attack with "+listGet(AttackSkillList,curSkill)] [R,IF(Cap==0),CODE:{ [R:attack(curLevel,Mods)] };{ [R:attack(curLevel,Mods,Cap)] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Pick attack skill
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Pick a skill by name, plus mods and cap, to do an attack with auto DA.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: <!-- Change the Parry1Level to your parry without DB for this weapon or use the set macro --!> [h: Parry1Level = 11] [h: Parry1Name = "Parry"] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry1Name") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyParry1Name", Parry1Name)] } ; {[h: Parry1Name = getProperty("MyParry1Name")]} ] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry1Level") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyParry1Level", Parry1Level)] } ; {[h: Parry1Level = getProperty("MyParry1Level")]} ] [h: Success=input("Mods")] [h: abort(Success)] [h: curLevel = Parry1Level +CurrentDB - ((4*Parry1)/(1+WeaponMaster))] [r: Parry1Name+" ("+(curLevel+Mods)]) [r:skill(curLevel,Mods)] [h: Parry1 = Parry1 + 1] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label="+Parry1Name+" ("+Parry1+")")] [h: setProperty("MyParry1Name",Parry1Name)] [h,foreach(macro,getMacros()), code: { [h,foreach(index, getMacroIndexes(macro)), code: { [h: props = getMacroProps(index)] [sortLabel = getStrProp(props, "sortBy")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*StartTurn.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=**Start turn**;color=red;fontColor=yellow")] }] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Staff (0)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: <!-- Change the Block1Level to your parry without DB for this weapon or use the set macro --!> [h: Block1Level = 11] [h: Block1Name = "Block"] [h,if(getProperty("MyBlock1Name") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyBlock1Name", Block1Name)] } ; {[h: Block1Name = getProperty("MyBlock1Name")]} ] [h,if(getProperty("MyBlock1Level") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyBlock1Level", Block1Level)] } ; {[h: Block1Level = getProperty("MyBlock1Level")]} ] [h: Success=input("Mods")] [h: abort(Success)] [h: curLevel = Block1Level +CurrentDB - round((5*Block1)/(1+WeaponMaster))] [r: Block1Name+" ("+(curLevel+Mods)]) [r:skill(curLevel,Mods)] [h: Block1 = Block1 + 1] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label="+Block1Name+" ("+Block1+")")] [h: setProperty("MyBlock1Name",Block1Name)] [h,foreach(macro,getMacros()), code: { [h,foreach(index, getMacroIndexes(macro)), code: { [h: props = getMacroProps(index)] [sortLabel = getStrProp(props, "sortBy")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*StartTurn.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=**Start turn**;color=red;fontColor=yellow")] }] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Block (0)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Success=input("Change")] [h: abort(Success)] [h: FP=FP+Change] [h: FP=if(FP>MaxFP,MaxFP,FP)] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label=FP ("+FP+")")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: FP (11)
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Current Fatigue Points. Click to change.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Success=input("Mods")] [h: abort(Success)] [h,if((HP/MaxHP < 1/3) || (FP/MaxFP < 1/3)): curLevel = round((floor(getProperty("Basic Speed"))+3)/2)+CombatReflexes+CurrentDB-Encumbrance; curLevel = (floor(getProperty("Basic Speed"))+3)+CombatReflexes+CurrentDB-Encumbrance;] Dodge([r:curLevel+mods]) [r:skill(curLevel,Mods)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Dodge

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Success=input("Change")] [h: abort(Success)] [h: HP=HP+Change] [h: HP=if(HP>MaxHP,MaxHP,HP)] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label=HP ("+HP+")")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: HP (11)
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Current Hit Points. Click to change.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: <!-- Change the Parry2Level to your parry without DB for this weapon or use the set macro --!> [h: Parry2Level = 11] [h: Parry2Name = "Parry2"] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry2Name") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyParry2Name", Parry2Name)] } ; {[h: Parry2Name = getProperty("MyParry2Name")]} ] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry2Level") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyParry2Level", Parry2Level)] } ; {[h: Parry2Level = getProperty("MyParry2Level")]} ] [h: Success=input("Mods")] [h: abort(Success)] [h: curLevel = Parry2Level +CurrentDB - ((4*Parry2)/(1+WeaponMaster))] [r: Parry2Name+" ("+(curLevel+Mods)]) [r:skill(curLevel,Mods)] [h: Parry2 = Parry2 + 1] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label="+Parry2Name+" ("+Parry2+")")] [h: setProperty("MyParry2Name",Parry2Name)] [h,foreach(macro,getMacros()), code: { [h,foreach(index, getMacroIndexes(macro)), code: { [h: props = getMacroProps(index)] [sortLabel = getStrProp(props, "sortBy")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*StartTurn.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=**Start turn**;color=red;fontColor=yellow")] }] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Brawling (0)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: eLevels = "None,Light,Medium,Heavy,Extra Heavy"] [h: Success=input("Mods| "+eLevels+" | New Encumbrance level |LIST| SELECT="+Encumbrance)] [h: abort(Success)] [h,if(Mods <= 4 && Mods >= 0):Encumbrance = Mods; Encumbrance = 0] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label=Encumbrance ("+listGet(eLevels,Encumbrance)+")")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Encumbrance (Light)
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Current Encumbrance Level. Click to change.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h:CurrentDB = getProperty("CurrentDB")] [h: Success=input("Mods | "+CurrentDB+" | New effective DB")] [h: abort(Success)] [h:CurrentDB = Mods] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label=DB ("+CurrentDB+")")] [h:setProperty("CurrentDB",CurrentDB )]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: DB (0)
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Current Defense Bonus. Click to change.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h:CombatReflexes = getProperty("CombatReflexes")] [h:WeaponMaster = getProperty("WeaponMaster")] [h: Success=input("CombatReflexes | "+CombatReflexes+"| Combat Reflexes | CHECK","WeaponMaster |"+WeaponMaster+"| Weapon Master | CHECK")] [h: abort(Success)] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label=CR: "+listGet("No,Yes",CombatReflexes)+" WM: "+listGet("No,Yes",WeaponMaster))] [h:setProperty("CombatReflexes",CombatReflexes)] [h:setProperty("WeaponMaster",WeaponMaster)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: CR: No WM: No
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Current Encumbrance Level. Click to change.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: <!-- Change the Parry3Level to your parry without DB for this weapon or use the set macro --!> [h: Parry3Level = 11] [h: Parry3Name = "Parry3"] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry3Name") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyParry3Name", Parry3Name)] } ; {[h: Parry3Name = getProperty("MyParry3Name")]} ] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry3Level") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyParry3Level", Parry3Level)] } ; {[h: Parry3Level = getProperty("MyParry3Level")]} ] [h: Success=input("Mods")] [h: abort(Success)] [h: curLevel = Parry3Level +CurrentDB - ((4*Parry3)/(1+WeaponMaster))] [r: Parry3Name+" ("+(curLevel+Mods)]) [r:skill(curLevel,Mods)] [h: Parry3 = Parry3 + 1] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label="+Parry3Name+" ("+Parry3+")")] [h: setProperty("MyParry3Name",Parry3Name)] [h,foreach(macro,getMacros()), code: { [h,foreach(index, getMacroIndexes(macro)), code: { [h: props = getMacroProps(index)] [sortLabel = getStrProp(props, "sortBy")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*StartTurn.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=**Start turn**;color=red;fontColor=yellow")] }] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Knife (0)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h,if(getProperty("MyBlock1Name") == " "), CODE: {[h: Block1Name = "Block"] } ; { [h: Block1Name = getProperty("MyBlock1Name")]}] [h,if(getProperty("MyBlock2Name") == " "), CODE: {[h: Block2Name = "Block2"] } ; { [h: Block2Name = getProperty("MyBlock2Name")]}] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry1Name") == " "), CODE: {[h: Parry1Name = "Parry"] } ; { [h: Parry1Name = getProperty("MyParry1Name")]}] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry2Name") == " "), CODE: {[h: Parry2Name = "Parry2"] } ; { [h: Parry2Name = getProperty("MyParry2Name")]}] "8"] } ; { [h: Parry1Level = getProperty("MyParry1Level")]}] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry2Level") == " "), CODE: {[h: Parry2Level = "8"] } ; { [h: Parry2Level = getProperty("MyParry2Level")]}] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry3Level") == " "), CODE: {[h: Parry3Level = "8"] } ; { [h: Parry3Level = getProperty("MyParry3Level")]}] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry4Level") == " "), CODE: {[h: Parry4Level = "8"] } ; { [h: Parry4Level = getProperty("MyParry4Level")]}] [h,if(HP == " "), CODE: {[h: HP = if(MaxHP != " ",MaxHP,10)] } ] [h,if(FP == " "), CODE: {[h: FP = if(MaxFP != " ",MaxFP,10)] } ] [h,if(ER == " "), CODE: {[h: ER = if(MaxER != " ",MaxER,0)] } ] [h,if(SpellMaint == " "), CODE: {[h: SpellMaint = 0] } ] [h,if(CombatReflexes == " "), CODE: {[h: CombatReflexes = 0] } ] [h,if(WeaponMaster == " "), CODE: {[h: WeaponMaster = 0] } ] [h,if(Encumbrance == " "), CODE: {[h: Encumbrance = 0] } ] [h,if(CurrentDB == " "), CODE: {[h: CurrentDB = 0] } ] [h: Success=input( "Block1Name | "+Block1Name+" | First Block |TEXT","Block1Level | "+Block1Level+" | Level", "Block2Name | "+Block2Name+" | Second Block |TEXT","Block2Level | "+Block2Level+" | Level", "Parry1Name | "+Parry1Name+" | First Parry |TEXT","Parry1Level | "+Parry1Level+" | Level", "Parry2Name | "+Parry2Name+" | Second Parry |TEXT","Parry2Level | "+Parry2Level+" | Level", "Parry3Name | "+Parry3Name+" | Third Parry |TEXT","Parry3Level | "+Parry3Level+" | Level", "Parry4Name | "+Parry4Name+" | Fourth Parry |TEXT","Parry4Level | "+Parry4Level+" | Level" )] [h: abort(Success)] [h: setProperty("MyBlock1Name", Block1Name)] [h: setProperty("MyBlock2Name", Block2Name)] [h: setProperty("MyParry1Name", Parry1Name)] [h: setProperty("MyParry2Name", Parry2Name)] [h: setProperty("MyParry3Name", Parry3Name)] [h: setProperty("MyParry4Name", Parry4Name)] [h: setProperty("MyBlock1Level", Block1Level)] [h: setProperty("MyBlock2Level", Block2Level)] [h: setProperty("MyParry1Level", Parry1Level)] [h: setProperty("MyParry2Level", Parry2Level)] [h: setProperty("MyParry3Level", Parry3Level)] [h: setProperty("MyParry4Level", Parry4Level)] [h: setProperty("MyBlock1Index", " ")] [h: setProperty("MyBlock2Index", " ")] [h: setProperty("MyParry1Index", " ")] [h: setProperty("MyParry2Index", " ")] [h: setProperty("MyParry3Index", " ")] [h: setProperty("MyParry4Index", " ")] [h: eLevels = "None,Light,Medium,Heavy,Extra Heavy"] [h,foreach(macro,getMacros()), code: { [h,foreach(index, getMacroIndexes(macro)), code: { [h: props = getMacroProps(index)] [sortLabel = getStrProp(props, "sortBy")] [r: "Sort on "+sortLabel] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense1.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyBlock1Name")+" ("+Block1+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense2.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyBlock2Name")+" ("+Block2+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense3.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyParry1Name")+" ("+Parry1+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense4.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyParry2Name")+" ("+Parry2+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense5.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyParry3Name")+" ("+Parry3+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*Defense6.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label="+getProperty("MyParry4Name")+" ("+Parry4+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*HitPoints.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=HP ("+HP+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*FatiguePoints.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=FP ("+FP+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*EnergyReserve.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=ER ("+ER+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*SpellsOn.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=Spells On ("+SpellMaint+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*statsCRWM.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=CR: "+listGet("No,Yes",CombatReflexes)+" WM: "+listGet("No,Yes",WeaponMaster))] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*statsDB.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=DB ("+CurrentDB+")")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*statsEncumbrance.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=Encumbrance ("+listGet(eLevels,Encumbrance)+")")] }] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Update & Set Defenses
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Current Encumbrance Level. Click to change.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: <!-- Change the Block2Level to your parry without DB for this weapon or use the set macro --!> [h: Block2Level = 11] [h: Block2Name = "Block2"] [h,if(getProperty("MyBlock2Name") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyBlock2Name", Block2Name)] } ; {[h: Block2Name = getProperty("MyBlock2Name")]} ] [h,if(getProperty("MyBlock2Level") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyBlock2Level", Block2Level)] } ; {[h: Block2Level = getProperty("MyBlock2Level")]} ] [h: Success=input("Mods")] [h: abort(Success)] [h: curLevel = Block2Level +CurrentDB - round((5*Block2)/(1+WeaponMaster))] [r: Block2Name+" ("+(curLevel+Mods)]) [r:skill(curLevel,Mods)] [h: Block2 = Block2 + 1] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label="+Block2Name+" ("+Block2+")")] [h: setProperty("MyBlock2Name",Block2Name)] [h,foreach(macro,getMacros()), code: { [h,foreach(index, getMacroIndexes(macro)), code: { [h: props = getMacroProps(index)] [sortLabel = getStrProp(props, "sortBy")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*StartTurn.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=**Start turn**;color=red;fontColor=yellow")] }] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: none (0)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Success=input("curSpell|"+SpellList+"|Spell:|LIST","Mods")] [h: abort(Success)] [r: listget(SpellList,curSpell)] [h: curLevel=listget(SpellLevels,curSpell)-SpellMaint] [r: spell(curLevel,Mods,listget(SpellPoints,curSpell))]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Pick Spell

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: <!-- Change the Parry4Level to your parry without DB for this weapon or use the set macro --!> [h: Parry4Level = 11] [h: Parry4Name = "Parry4"] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry4Name") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyParry4Name", Parry4Name)] } ; {[h: Parry4Name = getProperty("MyParry4Name")]} ] [h,if(getProperty("MyParry4Level") == " "), CODE: { [h: setProperty("MyParry4Level", Parry4Level)] } ; {[h: Parry4Level = getProperty("MyParry4Level")]} ] [h: Success=input("Mods")] [h: abort(Success)] [h: curLevel = Parry4Level +CurrentDB - ((4*Parry4)/(1+WeaponMaster))] [r: Parry4Name+" ("+(curLevel+Mods)]) [r:skill(curLevel,Mods)] [h: Parry4 = Parry4 + 1] [h: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [h: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label="+Parry4Name+" ("+Parry4+")")] [h: setProperty("MyParry4Name",Parry4Name)] [h,foreach(macro,getMacros()), code: { [h,foreach(index, getMacroIndexes(macro)), code: { [h: props = getMacroProps(index)] [sortLabel = getStrProp(props, "sortBy")] [if(matches(sortLabel,".*StartTurn.*")): setMacroProps(index, "label=**Start turn**;color=red;fontColor=yellow")] }] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: none (0)

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: /me [H: TimeZone="EST"] [H: curIndex = getMacroButtonIndex()] [H: NewTime = json.get(getInfo("client"),"timeDate")] [H: props=getMacroProps(curIndex,"json")] [H: OldTime = json.get(props, "label")] last used {OldTime} {TimeZone}, and uses LUCK again at {NewTime} {TimeZone}. [H: setMacroProps(curIndex, "label=Luck ("+NewTime+")")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Luck!

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Gets answers from the user asking what the effective skill level is, and for any modifiers -->
[H: Success = input("Skill | 10 | Skill Level", "Mods | 0 | Any modifiers to skill","Cap | 0 | Maximum skill cap (leave zero if not applicable)")]
<!-- aborts the macro if the user canceled (UNLIKE OPENRPG WHICH JUST KEEPS GOING AAAARG -->
[H: abort(Success)]
<!-- calls the GURPS dieroller to find out the results of the skill test -->
[R,IF(Cap==0),CODE:{
[T:attack(Skill,Mods)]
};{
[T:attack(Skill,Mods,Cap)]
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Attack
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Asks for skill, mods, cap and then makes an attack with auto DA

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H:AccBase=3] [H:SkillBase=18] [h:FastDraw=15] [h:status = input( "FastDrawing|1|Are you Fast Drawing?|CHECK", "FastDrawMods|0|Fast Draw Modifiers?", "FastReady|1|Are you Fast Readying?|CHECK", "junk|   | Actual Shooting |LABEL | TEXT=FALSE ", "AccApply|1|Does ACC apply?|CHECK", "DistancePenalty|2 yd,3 yd,5 yd,7 yd,10 yd,15 yd,20 yd,30 yd,50 yd,70 yd,100 yd|Distance Penalty|RADIO", "MiscMods|0|Miscelaneous shooting modifiers", "damType|imp,(2) pi,cut|Damage Type|RADIO|VALUE=STRING" )] [h:abort(status)] [h:Acc = if(AccApply == 1, if(damType == "cut",AccBase-1,AccBase), 0)] [IF(FastDrawing),CODE:{Fast Draw: Arrow ({FastDraw}) [sk(FastDraw,FastDrawMods)]
}] [IF(FastReady),CODE:{Fast Ready: Bow ({SkillBase-3}) [sk(SkillBase-3,FastDrawMods)]
}] Shoot Bow ({SkillBase}) @ range penalty -{DistancePenalty} - {MiscMods} misc [t:attk(SkillBase,Acc-DistancePenalty+MiscMods)]
Damage is [t:1d6+3] {damType} if successful.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Bow
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Fast Draw, Fire with range penalties.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H:AccBase=4] [H:SkillBase=19] [h:status = input( "FastDrawMods|0|Fast Draw Modifiers?", "FastReadyMods|0|Fast Ready Modifiers (beyond -3)", "junk|   | Feint |LABEL | TEXT=FALSE ", "MiscMods1|0|Miscelaneous feinting modifiers", "junk|   | Actual Shooting Attack Two |LABEL | TEXT=FALSE ", "AccApply2|1|Does ACC apply?|CHECK", "DistancePenalty2|2 yd,3 yd,5 yd,7 yd,10 yd,15 yd,20 yd,30 yd,50 yd,70 yd,100 yd|Distance Penalty|RADIO", "MiscMods2|0|Miscelaneous shooting modifiers", "damType2|imp,(2) pi,cut|Damage Type|RADIO|VALUE=STRING" )] [h:abort(status)] [H:Acc1 = 0] [H:Acc2 = if(AccApply2 == 1, if(damType2 == "cut",AccBase-1,AccBase), 0)] Fast Draw: 1 Arrow ({SkillBase-2}) [t:sk(SkillBase-2,+FastDrawMods)]
Fast Ready ({SkillBase-3}) [t:sk(SkillBase,-3+FastReadyMods)]
Feint Bow ({SkillBase}) [t:sk(SkillBase,MiscMods1)] -1 to resist for DWA
Fast Shoot Bow ({SkillBase-2}) @ range penalty -{DistancePenalty2} [t:attk(SkillBase,Acc2-DistancePenalty2+MiscMods2-2)] -1 to defend for DWA
Damage is [t:1d6+4] {damType2} if successful.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Bow Feint DWA
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Fast Draw Rapid Load DWA in a nice bundle with range penalties.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
/self [H:jsoncount=getProperty("SpellList")] [H:arrowtypes=json.get(jsoncount,"arrowtypes")] [H:status = input( "TypeOfArrow|"+arrowtypes+"|Type of Arrow|RADIO|VALUE=STRING", "ArrowsShot|1|Arrows Shot" )] [H:abort(status)] [H:BaseArrows = "arrows-"+TypeOfArrow] [H:LookingFor = "look-for-arrows-"+TypeOfArrow] [H:ArrowCount = json.get(jsoncount,BaseArrows)] [H:LookFor = json.get(jsoncount,LookingFor)] You had {ArrowCount} {TypeOfArrow} arrows, and had {LookFor} arrows lying around.
You now have [R:ArrowCount=ArrowCount-ArrowsShot] arrows, and have [R:LookFor=LookFor+ArrowsShot] lying around. [H:jsoncount = json.set(jsoncount, "arrows-"+TypeOfArrow,ArrowCount)] [H:jsoncount = json.set(jsoncount, "look-for-arrows-"+TypeOfArrow,LookFor)] [H:setProperty("SpellList",jsoncount)] [H: if( isFrameVisible("Quiver") ), code: {}; { [resetFrame("Quiver")] } ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Spend Arrows

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
/gm [H:jsoncount=getProperty("SpellList")] [H:arrowtypes=json.get(jsoncount,"arrowtypes")] [H:status = input( "TypeOfArrow|"+arrowtypes+"|Type of Arrow|RADIO|VALUE=STRING", "ArrowsShot|1|Arrows Shot" )] [H:abort(status)] [H:BaseArrows = "arrows-"+TypeOfArrow] [H:LookingFor = "look-for-arrows-"+TypeOfArrow] [H:ArrowCount = json.get(jsoncount,BaseArrows)] [H:LookFor = json.get(jsoncount,LookingFor)]
[h:Loop = json.get(jsoncount,LookingFor)] [h:Recovered=0] Looking for {Loop} lost {TypeOfArrow} arrows... [FOR (x,1,Loop+1,1, "; "), CODE:{[H:Test=3d6] [H:Found = IF(Test != 6, 1, 0)] [H:Recovered = Recovered + Found] [R,T(IF(Found,"Found","Lost forever")):"Rolled: "+Test]}]. [H:arrowTotal=json.get(jsoncount, BaseArrows)] I now have {arrowTotal+Recovered} {TypeOfArrow} arrows. [H:jsoncount = json.set(jsoncount, BaseArrows, arrowTotal+Recovered)] [H:jsoncount = json.set(jsoncount, LookingFor, 0)] [H:setProperty("SpellList", jsoncount)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Recover Arrows

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
/self [H:jsoncount=getProperty("SpellList")] [H:arrowtypes=json.get(jsoncount,"arrowtypes")] [H:Loop = listCount(arrowtypes)] [H:html=""] [H,FOR (x,0,Loop+1,1, "; "), CODE:{ [BaseArrows = "arrows-"+listGet(arrowtypes,x)] [LookingFor = "look-for-arrows-"+listGet(arrowtypes,x)] [html = html + " " + listGet(arrowtypes,x) + ""+ json.get(jsoncount,BaseArrows) + ""+ json.get(jsoncount,LookingFor) +""] }] [frame("Quiver", "width=300; height=200; temporary=0;"): { Quiver {html}
ArrowHeldFind
}] [ if( isFrameVisible("Quiver") ), code: {}; { [resetFrame("Quiver")] } ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Quiver

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H:AccBase=4][H:SkillBase=19] [h:status = input( "FastDrawMods|0|Fast Draw Modifiers beyond 2x?", "FastReadyMods|0|Fast Ready Modifiers (beyond -3)", "junk|   | Actual Shooting Attack One |LABEL | TEXT=FALSE ", "AccApply1|1|Does ACC apply?|CHECK", "DistancePenalty1|2 yd,3 yd,5 yd,7 yd,10 yd,15 yd,20 yd,30 yd,50 yd,70 yd,100 yd|Distance Penalty|RADIO", "MiscMods1|0|Miscelaneous shooting modifiers", "damType1|imp,(2) pi,cut|Damage Type|RADIO|VALUE=STRING", "junk|   | Actual Shooting Attack Two |LABEL | TEXT=FALSE ", "AccApply2|1|Does ACC apply?|CHECK", "DistancePenalty2|2 yd,3 yd,5 yd,7 yd,10 yd,15 yd,20 yd,30 yd,50 yd,70 yd,100 yd|Distance Penalty|RADIO", "MiscMods2|0|Miscelaneous shooting modifiers", "damType2|imp,(2) pi,cut|Damage Type|RADIO|VALUE=STRING" )] [h:abort(status)] [H:Acc1 = if(AccApply1 == 1, if(damType1 == "cut",AccBase-1,AccBase), 0)] [H:Acc2 = if(AccApply2 == 1, if(damType2 == "cut",AccBase-1,AccBase), 0)] Fast Draw: 2 Arrows ({SkillBase-2}-2) [t:sk(SkillBase-2,-2+FastDrawMods)]
Fast Ready ({SkillBase-3-2}) [t:sk(SkillBase,-3-2+FastReadyMods)]
Fast Shoot Bow ({SkillBase}) @ range penalty -{DistancePenalty1} [t:a(SkillBase,Acc1-DistancePenalty1+MiscMods1)] -1 to defend
Fast Shoot Bow ({SkillBase}) @ range penalty -{DistancePenalty2} [t:a(SkillBase,Acc2-DistancePenalty2+MiscMods2)] -1 to defend
Damage is [t:1d6+4] {damType1} and [t:1d6+4] {damType2} if successful.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Bow DWA
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Fast Draw Rapid Load DWA in a nice bundle with range penalties.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[frame("HitLocationsReference", "width=300; height=200;"):{Grand Unified Hit Locations Table

Grand Unified Hit Locations Table

LocationPenaltyRestrictionsEffects
Skull-7-5 from behind2 DR; if not tox: x4 inj; if not tox: major wound -10 stun/knockdown; bleed at 30 seconds not 1 minute
Face-5-7 from behindRoll on sub-table; Cor x1.5 inj; Major wound -5 stun/knockdown
Neck-5 Roll on sub-table; Miss by 1 hit chest; Cr, corr: x1.5 inj; cut x2 inj; bleed at 30 seconds not 1 minute; -2 bleed penalty
Arm-2-4 with shieldRoll on sub-table; pi+, pi++, imp: x1 inj; cripple over 1/2 HP
Hand-4-8 with shieldRoll on sub-table; pi+, pi++, imp: x1 inj; cripple over 1/3 HP
Chest0 Roll on sub-table; Default. Crushing, impaling, or piercing attacks, roll on sub table; injury cant exceed 2xHP (1xHP if using bleeding); any excess is lost
Abdomen-1 Roll on sub-table; Crushing, impaling, or piercing attacks, roll on sub table.; Injury cant exceed 2xHP (1xHP if using bleeding); any excess is lost
Leg-2 Roll on sub-table; pi+, pi++, imp: x1 inj; cripple over 1/2 HP
Foot-4 Roll on sub-table; pi+, pi++, imp: x1 inj; cripple over 1/3 HP
Eye-9-10 in helmet; imp, pi-, pi, pi+, pi++, bu (tb) onlycripple over 1/10 hp; otherwise skull hit w/no DR. Tox has no spec. effect beyond cripple; bleed at 30 seconds not 1 minute
Ear-7cutting or treat as faceMiss by 1 hit chest; cripple over 1/4 HP, no -5 to stun/knockdown, major wound only on sever; lost ear causes Appearance penalties.
Nose-7front onlyMiss by 1 hit chest; cripple over 1/4 HP and causes No Sense of Smell/Taste (non-cutting) or Appearance loss (cutting, x2 crippling threshold), non-cutting major wound -5 to stun/knockdown
Jaw-6front onlyMiss by 1 hit chest; as per face, but crushing is -6 to stun/knockdown
Spine-8behind only, cr, cut, pi-, pi, pi+, pi++, bu (tb) onlyMiss by 1 hit chest; 3 DR; as per chest but enough injury for shock penalty (even with HPT) gives stun/knockdown, -5 if a major wound. Cripple over 1xHP
Neck Vein/Artery-8cu, imp, pi-, pi, pi+, pi++, bu (tb) onlyMiss by 1 hit neck; Cr, corr: x2 inj; cut x2.5 inj
Limb Vein/Artery-5cu, imp, pi-, pi, pi+, pi++, bu (tb) onlyMiss by 1 hit limb; Cr, corr: x2 inj; cut x2.5 inj; no cripple, no inj limit
Limb Joint-5cr, cut, pi-, pi, pi+, pi++, bu (tb) onlyMiss by 1 hit limb; as per limb but cripple over 1/3 HP; dismember as per limb, not per joint; recover from cripple at -2
Extremity Joint-7cr, cut, pi-, pi, pi+, pi++, bu (tb) onlyMiss by 1 hit extremity; as per extremity but cripple over 1/4 HP; dismember as per extremity, not per joint; recover from cripple at -2
Vitals (Heart)-5Imp; pi-, pi, pi+, pi++; bu (tb) onlyImp, pi-, pi, pi+, pi++: x3 inj; bu (tb) x2 inj (as vitals); bleed at 30 seconds not 1 minute; -4 bleed penalty; -5 to stun/knockdown from MW
Vitals-3Imp; pi-, pi, pi+, pi++; bu (tb) onlyImp, pi-, pi, pi+, pi++: x3 inj; bu (tb) x2 inj; bleed at 30 seconds not 1 minute; -4 bleed penalty; -5 to stun/knockdown from MW
Digestive Tract-3 As abdomen; on major wound HT-3 to avoid special infection (p.444)
Pelvis-2 As abdomen; on major wound fall down, cannot stand, Lame (Missing Legs) until healed
Groin-3 double shock; major wound -5 stun/knockdown
Weapon Reach C-5 see weapon breakage p.401
Weapon Reach 1-4 see weapon breakage p.401
Weapon Reach 2-3 see weapon breakage p.401
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: HitLocationTable

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [r:macro.return = "random,chest,abdomen,torso,vitals,arm,leg,foot,hand,face,neck,brain,skull,eye,ear,nose,jaw,spine,neck vein,limb vein,heart,digestive tract,pelvis,groin"]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: HitLocations
HitLocationPenalty
